BodRawD328.Transcription: come wynde come reynecome he neuer agayne
BodRawD328.Note:
Translating ‘Ventus cum pluuia…’, which
                    precedes it; English portion all written on one line.
BodRawD328.Editions:
Meech,  Sanford Brown. 
             “A Collection of Proverbs in Rawlinson MS D 328.” 
             Modern Philology
         38 (1940-41): 113-32: 124.
